plot: Talk about performing before a dead crowd, Melinda discovers a comedy club with a late night afterlife, and a deceased comic that should have become the next Lenny Bruce.

Melinda encounters the water-logged spirit of a confused dead comic who doesn't understand his current state of existence. Having taken his own life, she helps him make amends with all those whom he left behind so he can pass over. Meanwhile, the antique shop basks in its recent business boom.—Abakusek
